Bu Aralar Neler Dinliyorum Vol.2



Bu aralar neler dinliyorum serisinin ilkine buradan ulaşabilirsiniz.

James Murphy - If You Need A Friend


Muddy Waters - I’m Your Hoochie Coochie Man


Little Walter - My Babe


Lenny Kravitz - Fly Away


She & Him - Together


Arctic Monkeys - Do I Wanna Know


The Smiths - There Is A Light That Never Goes Out


Hot Chocolate  - Every 1’s a Winner


Daft Punk - Giorgio by Moroder


Pulp Fiction - Surf Rider


Pulp Fiction - Girl, You’ll Be a Woman Soon


David Bowie - Heroes


Jason Mraz - Lucky (feat. Colbie Caillat)


Wankelmut & Emma Louise - My Head Is A Jungle


Empire of the Sun - DNA (Calvin Harris Remix)


Calvin Harris - Thinking About You (feat. Ayah Marar)


Fedde le Grand & Nicky Romero - Sparks


Avicii - You Make Me


Patty Pravo - La Bambola (Tucillo Tribute Remix)
